title: Downtown San Rafael with a view!  Plus up to 6 weeks free rent!*
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!

to self-schedule from your phone or visit us at <URL>
Where you will experience the perfect blend of Marin convenience and a luxurious lifestyle.
Available for the first time, Second and B Street offers high-end amenities, modern living, with large light bright windows, and sweeping views.
This boutique 41-unit building is smartly designed with security features and an onsite secure parking garage.
Second and B features several different floor plans with 1 bedroom 1 bath or 2-bedroom 2 bath units.
Sliding doors lead to your own patio or balcony.
The fourth floor offers an exquisite common area with a kitchen, teak furniture, and an outdoor barbeque.
2 pets per household$500 deposit$50 / month pet rentWeight and breed restrictions apply.
